'''''Amon Hen'' 300''' is the three-hundredth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in April [[2023]].

==Contents==
* Cover Art: The Argonath by [[Ted Nasmith]]
* '''2''' - From the Editor's Desk
* '''4''' - Art: Frodo and Boromir by [[Anke Eissman]]
* '''6''' - A Look Back at Amon Hen by [[Shaun Gunner]]
* '''8''' - Art: Amon Hen by Scott Peery
* '''10''' - Reviewing those Radio 'Rings' Reviews by [[Brian Sibley]]
* '''14''' - Art: The Horn of Boromir by [[Matt Stewart]]
* '''16''' - From Dreams to Masterpieces: The Art of Jay Johnstone by Amanda Drake
* '''18''' - Centerfold Art: Falls of Rauros by [[Jay Johnstone]]
* '''23''' - Turning Fans Into Readers and Readers Into Fans, One Listener at a Time by [[Alan Sisto]]
* '''26''' - Art: At the Falls by Ted Nasmith
* '''28''' - Lunching with Legends: My Afternoon with Ted Nasmith by Mat Suta
* '''30''' - Memorable Moments in my Fifty Years in the Tolkien Society by Jessica Yates
* '''34''' - My Father the Artist by Priscilla Tolkien
* Back Cover: J.R.R. Tolkien: Architect of Middle Earth by [[Brothers Hildebrandt|Greg & Tim Hildebrandt]]
